data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: Dragon boat festival in China is a festival that commemorate Qu Yuan who was dedicated to restoring relations between the states of Chu and the neighboring Qi in the fourth century. The court of Chu was rife with corruption, though, and greedy ministers were being bribed by enemies. The loyal Qu Yuan was framed, and the king was turned against him. Driven to despair, Qu Yuan drowned himself in the Miluo River. When locals learned that he had drowned himself, they raced out in wooden boats, beating drums and splashing the water with their paddles to scare off evil spirits and fish, on a desperate search and rescue mission. Therefore, this becomes a tradition on the day that he died.
data.referenceText: What are some festivals or celebrations that commemorate important people in your country?
data.referenceTranslate: 你们国家有哪些纪念重要人物的节日或庆典?
